page.title: 17Games Children Play
page.content: GAMES CHILDREN PLAY:at home Indoor games include junior scrabble, card games,chess,monopoly,weddings, operations,the clothes game,wizard, apple picking,perfection,guess who and school. Outdoor games include crazy ball,high jump,badminton,peggyleggy,piggy in the middle,rounders,three bad eggs, flounders and football.In the park or playground we play many different games.To play trains we all link hands by monkey grip.The person at the front runs around twisting and turning.I think this game is enjoyable but after a while your hands start to hurt.Another game we play is called line tick.We use the netball pitch as the lines.Two people go "on" in this game and they give you ten seconds to get away.The others make a circle and more and more are caught in it.
